Name: Spijker Bar
Review Text:

Drinks were reasonable priced and they took card. The smokers room is upstairs …

Name: Spijker Bar
Review Text: Cozy gay bar in the heart of the city. Reasonable prices, friendly crew, long bar, open fireplace, pool table. Mixed crowd. Happy hour around 17.00 hours. Find the winding staircase to 1st floor for the toilets and smoking room. You may also go outside for a smoke.

Name: Spijker Bar
Review Text: A great place and have been going there for many years, but this Bartender "Jerry" is an obnoxious fool. Apparently a favourite of the owner, for who knows what reason, feels he can get away with threatening longtime customers? What a joke. …

Name: Spijker Bar
Review Text: Best gay bar in Amsterdam!

Name: Spijker Bar
Review Text: Fun little bar with chill guys interested in playing pool, smoking weed, and drinking beers. Good music and excellent mood with fun movies (the birdcage and Rocky Horror were on while I was there) or porn on the TVs throughout the bar. Got a pail of 5 Heinekens for €15 to share and played a few games of pool at €0.50 a game.

Name: Spijker Bar
Review Text: Place is alright, felt at ease but the crowd is a bit older. Being there with a friend was nice, but as a 25yo I wouldn’t go there alone I think.

Name: Spijker Bar
Review Text: Nice place with great beers. People were easy to talk with here. We will diffently come back. Also the atmosphere is a bit ruff which is nice.

Name: Spijker Bar
Review Text: Wonderful local bar with fantastic bartenders! If you are looking for a friendly laid back bar this is your place. Oh and come in late to see Arthur, not only is he sweet he is super handsome.

Name: Spijker Bar
